title: High Priestess
fullDescription: Reveal all cards in your $Future%. $Discard% a fate, then $Draw 1 Fate% revealed and replace it.^$Add% all faceup cards in your $Future% to your hand then $Draw 1 Tarot%, even exceeding $Max Hand%.
shortDescription: Either reveal your future and replace a card, or bring visible cards in your future to your hand and draw.

title: Fool
fullDescription:
$Discard% all cards in your $Future%.^$Target%: Other Players

$Steal 1% from target player's hand.
shortDescription: Either discard your future, or steal a card from another player.

title: Magician
fullDescription: $Draw 1 Fate%, then $Draw 3 Tarot%.^Other players $In Order% $Draw 2 Fate%, even if it exceeds their $Max Hand%.
shortDescription: Either draw 1 fate then draw 3 tarots, or force all other players to draw 2 fates.

title: Empress
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players With Deaths

$Steal 2% from the target's hand, they then may choose to $Discard% a Death from their modifiers.^$Target%: Other Players

Target player $Discards% 1 tarot, or 2 tarots if they have 4 or more.
shortDescription: Either steal and let a player discard a death, or force a player to discard tarots.

title: Emperor
fullDescription: The current player immediately $Ends Their Turn%.^Play this immediately after a $Targeted% tarot is played targeting you to change the target to another player.
shortDescription: Either immediately end the current turn, or change the target of a tarot targeting you.

title: Hierophant
fullDescription: $Discard% a $Non-Modifier% tarot immediately after it is played, such that it has no effect.^$Discard% a $Modifier% fate.
shortDescription: Either counterspell a non-modifier tarot, or discard a modifier fate.

title: Lovers
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players

$Effect%: You and the target view each other's hands, and may agree to trade any number of cards.^$Target%: Other Players

$Draw 3 Tarot%, keep 2, and give 1 to the target player.
shortDescription: Either you and another view each other's hands and trade cards, or draw 3 and give 1 to a player.

title: Chariot
fullDescription: $Draw 2 Fate% and $Add% them to the front of your $Future% $Revealed%.^$Draw 4 Fate% and $Add% them to the tarot deck, then $End Your Turn%.
shortDescription: Either add 2 revealed fate to the front of your future, or put 4 fate on the tarot deck and end your turn.

title: Strength
fullDescription:
$Draw 5 Tarot%, reorder them in any order, then $Add% them back to the tarot deck.^Target: Any Player
Target player $Draws 1 Tarot%, then $Draws 3 Fate%.
shortDescription: Either rearrange the top 5 tarots, or make someone draw 1 tarot then 3 fate.

title: Hermit
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: $Scry Range +3%, $Scout 3%, and $Hand Size -2%.^$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: Your future can not be affected by other player's cards.
shortDescription: Mod to either improve scry but lose hand size, or safeguard your future.

title: Wheel of Fortune
fullDescription: Roll a d100. If >=40 is rolled, $Draw 2 Tarot%. If >=80 is rolled, $Draw 3 Tarot% instead.^Other players $In Order% roll a d100, and $Discard 1% tarot if <=60 is rolled, or 2 if <= 20 is rolled.
shortDescription: Either roll to draw tarots, or force other to roll to discard.

title: Justice
fullDescription:
$Pair% with any $Revealed%, $Non-Modifier% fate. When played, the fate applies to all players $In Order% from the person playing it.^$Target%: Other Players

All players $In Order% $Draw 1 Tarot%, except the target who $Draws 2 Fate% instead.
shortDescription: Either apply a non-modifier fate to everyone, or force someone to draw 2 fate while others draw a tarot.

title: Hanged Man
fullDescription:
Rearrange your $Future% in any order.^$Target%: Other Players

$Steal 2% from target player. They $Discard% 1, then give you the other.
shortDescription: Either rearrange your future, or make someone discard, and gift you 1 card.

title: Reaper
fullDescription:
$Discard% any active $Modifier%.^$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: Target takes turns even if dead, but $Draws 1 Fate% instead of $Drawing 1 Tarot% to start their turn when dead.
shortDescription: Either destroy a modifier, or modify a dead player to have turns by drawing fate.

title: Temperance
fullDescription:
$Draw 1 Tarot% and $End Your Turn%^$Target%: Any Player

The target player must immediately play a card of their choice from their $Future%.
shortDescription: Either draw and end your turn, or force someone to play from their future.

title: Devil
fullDescription: All players $In Order% $Discard% until having 3 cards.^$Add% your $Future% to your hand, even exceeding $Max Hand%. $Replenish% your $Future% from your hand, then $Discard% all tarots in your hand.
shortDescription: Either everyone discards down to 3, or draw your future and replace it from your hand.

title: Tower
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players

$Reveal% up to 4 cards in targetâ€™s hand.^All players $In Order% $Discard% revealed cards in their $Future%.
shortDescription: Either reveal 4 cards of someone's hand, or discard all revealed fates in futures.

title: Star
fullDescription: Play this immediately after playing a fate to $Discard% it with no effect, then $Draw 1 Fate% and immediately play it instead.^$Reveal% up to 2 random cards in each other player's hand.
shortDescription: Either replace a played fate, or reveal 2 cards in every player's hand.

title: Moon
fullDescription: View the top 4 cards of the tarot deck without rearranging, and $Add% one to your hand.^$Draw 2 Tarot% and $Draw 2 Fate%, then $Add 2% to both decks from these 4 cards.
shortDescription: Either keep one of 4 tarots, or reorganize the topmost 2 cards of both decks.

title: Sun
fullDescription: Other players $In Order% $Draw 1 Tarot%, then give you a tarot of their choice from their hand.^$Draw 3 Fate%, then distribute them among other players, split in any way.
shortDescription: Either other players draw 1 then give you a tarot, or you give 3 fates to other players.

title: Judgement
fullDescription:
$Target%: Player with the most cards

Target $Discards% until equal in cards with another player.^$Target%: Player with the least cards

$Target Draws 1 Fate% until equal in cards with another player.
shortDescription: Either the player with most discards, or the player with least draws fates.

title: World
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: Target $Draws 2 Tarot% when gaining a Death effect.^$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: Target $Draws 2 Fate% when gaining a Death effect.
shortDescription: Mod either to draw 2 tarots or 2 fates when gaining a death.

title: 2 of Wands
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: Target draws 1 more tarot if they would draw to start their turn, then $Adds% 1 back to the tarot deck. This can stack.
shortDescription: Mod to draw 1 more card to choose from at the start of your turn.

title: 3 of Wands
fullDescription: This card replicates the top card on the tarot discard, including keywords like $Instant%. You may choose new inversions and targets.
shortDescription: Replicate the effect of the most recently played tarot

title: 4 of Wands
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: All players may choose to $Draw 1 Fate% then $Draw 1 Tarot% immediately after drawing to start their turn.
shortDescription: Mod to let players draw a tarot and fate when starting their turn.

title: 5 of Wands
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players

$Steal 1% from target, then force target to immediately play the selected card as if it was their turn.
shortDescription: Randomly choose a card and force target player to immediately play it.

title: 6 of Wands
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Add% a card from your hand to the target's $Future% $Revealed%, then rearrange it in any way.
shortDescription: Add a card to a future revealed, then rearrange it.

title: 7 of Wands
fullDescription: Reverse the order of play, then $End Your Turn%.
shortDescription: Reverse the order of play, ending your turn.

title: 8 of Wands
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any 2 Players

Targets swap fates, retaining order and card visibility.
shortDescription: Two players swap fates.

title: 9 of Wands
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: When target $Draws Tarot%, they draw from the bottom of the deck.
shortDescription: Mod to make a player draw from the bottom of the tarot deck.

title: 10 of Wands
fullDescription: Players $In Order% roll a d100. For each roll, the roller and all previous players $Draw 1 Tarot% $In Order% if the roll is higher than the previous roll. If lower, this card resolves immediately, without more draws.
shortDescription: Players take turns rolling a d100 to draw, until a lower number is rolled.

title: Page of Wands
fullDescription: Play this immediately after an $Invertible% tarot was played to reverse the orientation. The owner may choose new targets if applicable.
shortDescription: Instantly reverse the alignment of an Invertible tarot.

title: Knight of Wands
fullDescription: $Draw 3 Tarot% and create a new pile. When you would $Draw Tarot%, you may choose to draw from this pile instead.
shortDescription: Create a 3 card pile you may draw from instead of the tarot deck.

title: Queen of Wands
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: $Scout 2%. $Scry Range +2%. $Max Hand -2%.
shortDescription: Mod to increase visible range, at the cost of hand size.

title: King of Wands
fullDescription: All players immediately pass up to 5 fates in their hand to the next player $In Order%, even exceeding $Max Hand%.
shortDescription: Every player passes up to 5 fates to the next player in order.

title: Ace of Wands
fullDescription: All players $In Order% $Draw 1 Tarot% and $Pair% it with the next fate in their $Future%. After the fate resolves, the $Paired% card is immediately played.
shortDescription: Pair a tarot with the next fate in every player's future.

title: 2 of Swords
fullDescription: $Draw 10% from the fate discard and $Add% them to the tarot deck, then $Shuffle% it. $Discard% the next card in your $Future%, then $End Your Turn%.
shortDescription: Shuffle 10 discarded fates into the tarot deck, shuffle, discard, then end your turn.

title: 3 of Swords
fullDescription: All players $In Order% $Draw 1 Tarot%. Other players $In Order% then $Discard% 1 tarot to the bottom of the fate deck.
shortDescription: Everyone draws 1, then others discard 1 to the bottom of the fate deck.

title: 4 of Swords
fullDescription: Swap the top 3 cards of the tarot and fate decks, without viewing them.
shortDescription: Swap the top 3 cards of the tarot and fate decks.

title: 5 of Swords
fullDescription: $Draw 1 Fate% then search the tarot deck for any card, $Reveal% it, add it to your hand, then $Shuffle% the tarot deck.
shortDescription: Draw a fate then publicly pull a card of your choice from the tarot deck.

title: 6 of Swords
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

When the target $Draws Tarot% or $Draws Fate%, they draw from the other deck instead. $Discard% this modifier after they $Draw 1 Tarot% to start their turn.
shortDescription: Mod a player to draw from opposite decks until the start of their turn.

title: 7 of Swords
fullDescription: All other players $In Order% $Discard% a tarot onto the top of the tarot deck.
shortDescription: All other players discard a tarot onto the tarot deck.

title: 8 of Swords
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Max Hand +1%. At the start of the target's turn, they $Draw 1 Fate% without revealing it, and $Add% it to the bottom of the tarot deck.
shortDescription: Mod to increase hand size, and move fates to the bottom of the tarot deck.

title: 9 of Swords
fullDescription: Remove all fates from the tarot deck, $Shuffle% the tarot deck and fates, then $Add% the removed fates to the tarot deck.
shortDescription: Move all fates in the tarot deck to the top.

title: 10 of Swords
fullDescription: All other players $In Order% $Discard% a tarot and $Add% it to the fate deck. $Shuffle% the fate deck.
shortDescription: All players discard into the fate deck before shuffling it.

title: Page of Swords
fullDescription: Cut both the fate and tarot decks once in any spot, where cutting is swapping two halves of the deck.
shortDescription: Cut the fate and tarot deck in any spot.

title: Knight of Swords
fullDescription: $Draw 2 Tarot%. Afterwards, $Draw 5 Fate%, $Add% them to the tarot deck, then $Shuffle%.
shortDescription: Draw 2, then shuffle 5 fates into the tarot deck.

title: Queen of Swords
fullDescription: $Shuffle% the fate and tarot decks, then $Draw 1 Tarot%.
shortDescription: Shuffle the fate and tarot decks, then draw.

title: King of Swords
fullDescription: $Draw 5 Tarot%, $Add% 1 to your $Future% $Revealed%, then $Shuffle% the rest into the fate deck.
shortDescription: Draw 5 tarots, add 1 to your future, and shuffle the rest into the fate deck.

title: Ace of Swords
fullDescription: Play X fates from your hand, then $Draw 1 Tarot% X times.
shortDescription: Play fates and replace them with tarots.

title: 2 of Pentacles
fullDescription:
$Target%: $Dead% Players

All other players give 2 tarots of their choice to the target, even exceeding their max hand.
shortDescription: Force other players to give a dead player 2 tarots.

title: 3 of Pentacles
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

Target $Draws 1 Fate%. You $Draw 1 Tarot%.
shortDescription: Draw 1, then force a player to draw a fate.

title: 4 of Pentacles
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players

If the target has fewer tarots than you (not including this card), privately swap hands.
shortDescription: Swap hands with a player with fewer tarots.

title: 5 of Pentacles
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: At the start of target's turn, they $Draw 1 Tarot% extra, then $Draw 1 Fate%.
shortDescription: Mod someone to draw an extra card, but also draw fates.

title: 6 of Pentacles
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: When played, $Discard% all fates and $Draw 1 Tarot% up to 5 cards. This then functions as a Death card.
shortDescription: Discard all fates and draw 5 tarots, but gain a Death.

title: 7 of Pentacles
fullDescription: $Discard% X tarots, then $Draw X+1 Tarot%, where X is less than or equal to 2.
shortDescription: Discard up to 2 tarots, and draw back that many plus 1.

title: 8 of Pentacles
fullDescription: All players $In Order% $Draw 1 Tarot%, until a player would exceed their max hand by drawing.
shortDescription: Players take turns drawing until a person would exceed max hand.

title: 9 of Pentacles
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: $Max Hand -1%.
shortDescription: Mod to decrease a player's max hand size by 1.

title: 10 of Pentacles
fullDescription: All $Dead% players must give you 2 tarots of their choice from their hand.
shortDescription: Get 2 tarots from every dead player.

title: Page of Pentacles
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players

$Effect%: When the target next $Draws Tarot%, you immediately $Steal% it after they view the card, and $Discard% this modifier.
shortDescription: Mod a player to steal the next card they draw.

title: Knight of Pentacles
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: $Max Hand +1%.
shortDescription: Mod to increase max hand size by 1.

title: Queen of Pentacles
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players

$Steal% an active modifier from the target, such that it affects you now.
shortDescription: Steal another player's active modifier, and move it to your modifiers.

title: King of Pentacles
fullDescription: $Draw 4 Tarot%, then $Draw 4 Fate%, even exceeding $Max Hand%.
shortDescription: Draw 4 tarots and fates, potentially exceeding your max hand size.

title: Ace of Pentacles
fullDescription: All players $In Order% $Steal 1% from the hand of the player that goes after them in turn order.
shortDescription: All players steal a card from the person in front of them.

title: 2 of Cups
fullDescription: $Discard% up to 3 cards from your $Future% and/or hand.
shortDescription: Discard up to 3 cards from your future and/or hand.

title: 3 of Cups
fullDescription: $Draw 1 Tarot% face down and $Add% it to your $Future%.
shortDescription: Add a tarot to your future.

title: 4 of Cups
fullDescription: $Add% this card $Revealed% to your $Future%. This card does not count towards $Scry Range%.
shortDescription: Add this card revealed to your future.

title: 5 of Cups
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Target

$Effect%: When playing from their $Future%, the target may choose to play the second fate instead of the first.
shortDescription: Mod to play either the second or first fate in your future.

title: 6 of Cups
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: $Scry Range +1% and $Scout 1%.
shortDescription: Mod to increase scrying range and scout by 1.

title: 7 of Cups
fullDescription: $Draw 2 Fate% and $Add% them to your $Future%, then $Reveal% and rearrange all cards in your $Future%.
shortDescription: Add 2 fates to your future, then reveal and rearrange it.

title: 8 of Cups
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: The target cannot be affected by $Scout%. They $Unreveal% and $Shuffle% their $Future% when played. $Discard% this after they play a Death.
shortDescription: A player shuffles and cannot see their future until they play a death.

title: 9 of Cups
fullDescription:
$Target%: Any Player

$Effect%: Target $Draws 1 Fate% at the start of their turn. When they would play from their $Future%, they must instead play a fate from their hand if able.
shortDescription: Mod someone to draw and play fates from their hand, instead of their future.

title: 10 of Cups
fullDescription: $Reveal% all cards in your $Future%, then $Discard% 1 and $Draw 1 Tarot% to replace it.
shortDescription: Reveal your future, then replace a card in it with a tarot.

title: Page of Cups
fullDescription: Swap any 2 fate cards in any $Future(s)%. $Draw 1 Tarot%.
shortDescription: Swap any 2 fates, then draw.

title: Knight of Cups
fullDescription: Swap 2 cards in every player's $Future%.
shortDescription: Swap 2 cards in every player's future.

title: Queen of Cups
fullDescription: $Draw 1 Fate% and $Pair% it for every card in your $Future%. When played, choose which card to play and $Discard% the other.
shortDescription: Pair fates in your future, and choose which is used when played.

title: King of Cups
fullDescription: $Draw 1 Fate% and $Add% to your $Future% $Revealed% until at double your $Scry Range%.
shortDescription: Add fates to your future until reaching double your scry range.

title: Ace of Cups
fullDescription: $Discard% a Death modifier. All other players $In Order% may choose to $Discard% 1 tarot to $Discard% 1 Death modifier.
shortDescription: Discard a Death, all others can discard a tarot to remove a Death as well.

title: Death
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: $Scout 1%. If affected by Deaths equal to your Death Limit, you are Dead.
shortDescription: Scout 1, counts for the death limit.

title: Corruption
fullDescription: $Discard% 1 tarot, and $Draw 1 Fate%.
shortDescription: Discard a tarot and draw a fate.

title: Paranoia
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: $Scry Range -1%.
shortDescription: Your scrying range decreases by 1.

title: Ruin
fullDescription: $Reveal% all cards in your $Future%, $Discard% all neutral fates and tarots, then unreveal and shuffle it before replenishing.
shortDescription: Reveal your future, remove all tarots/neutral fates in it, then unreveal and shuffle.

title: Betrayal
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players

Target player $Steals 1% from your hand.
shortDescription: A player of your choice steals a card from you.

title: Misfortune
fullDescription: $Discard% 1 tarot.
shortDescription: Discard a tarot.

title: Doom
fullDescription: Search the fate deck for a Death, $Add% it to your $Future% face up, then $Shuffle% the fate deck.
shortDescription: Place a Death face up at the end of your future.

title: Pestilence
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: All players $Draw 1 Fate% after they $Draw 1 Tarot% at the start of their turn. At any time, if all players agree, $Discard% this card immediately.
shortDescription: All players draw a fate at the start of their turn.

title: Sickness
fullDescription: $Draw 2 Fate%.
shortDescription: Draw 2 fates.

title: Lightning
fullDescription: The next player $In Order% may choose to $Discard% 1 card in your modifier pool.
shortDescription: the next player may discard one of your modifiers.

title: Martyr
fullDescription: $Discard% 1 tarot. Other players $In Order% $Draw 1 Tarot%.
shortDescription: Discard a tarot, everyone else draws a card.

title: Blindness
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: $Scry Range +1%, $Scout 1%, $Max Hand -2%.
$Discard% to your new $Max Hand% when played.
shortDescription: Your scry range is increased, and max hand decreased by 2. Discard down.

title: Pillage
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players

Give a tarot of your choice to the target player. If you do not have a tarot, they $Draw 1 Tarot% instead.
shortDescription: Give a tarot to another player.

title: Grief
fullDescription: When played, $Add% this to your hand and reveal it, even exceeding $Max Hand%. If revealed, this card can not be played from a player's hand.
shortDescription: Add this card to your hand revealed, it can no longer be played.

title: Terror
fullDescription: $Draw 1 Fate$. If not already over, $End your Turn%.
shortDescription: Draw a fate and end your turn.

title: Weakness
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: $Max Hand -1%.
$Discard% to your new $Max Hand% when played.
shortDescription: Your hand size is decreased by 1. Discard down.

title: Gossip
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: You must always have X tarots $Revealed%, where X is Gossip modifiers affecting you. If under X, permanently $Reveal% tarots of your choice up to X, if possible.
shortDescription: You must have tarots revealed equal to stacks of Gossip.

title: Despair
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: $Scry Range -2%.
shortDescription: Your Scry Range is greatly decreased.

title: Sanctuary
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: Your next turn is skipped. $Discard% this after skipping your turn.
shortDescription: Your next turn is skipped.

title: Revelations
fullDescription: $Reveal% every card in your hand.
shortDescription: Reveal every card in your hand.

title: Delusions
fullDescription:
$Target%: Self

$Effect%: At the start of every turn, $Shuffle% the first card of your $Future% into the fate deck, then $Draw 1 Fate% and replace it.
shortDescription: Randomize the first card in your future every turn.

title: Perversion
fullDescription: $Draw 1 Fate% until you hold a number of fates more or equal to the number of held tarots, even exceeding $Max Hand%.
shortDescription: Draw fates until you have an equal number of fates and tarots.

title: Juxtaposition
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players

Target may choose to $Reveal% an $Instant% card in their hand. If they do so, it is immediately triggered as if played.
shortDescription: Let a player activate an instant without playing it.

title: Suspense
fullDescription: $Draw 2 Fate% facedown and $Pair% them. $Add% them to your $Future%.
shortDescription: Add 2 fates that activate in sequence to your future.

title: Turmoil
fullDescription: $Draw 1 Fate%, and immediately play it.
shortDescription: Draw and immediately play another fate.

title: Peace
fullDescription: No effect.
shortDescription: No effect.

title: Fickleness
fullDescription: $Discard% 2 tarots of your choice, then $Draw 1 Tarot% if 2 were $Discarded%.
shortDescription: Discard 2 tarots, then draw 1.

title: Opportunity
fullDescription:
$Target%: Dead Players

Remove a Death from the target and $Add% it to their $Future%.
shortDescription: Move a Death on a dead player to their future.

title: Trade
fullDescription:
$Target%: Other Players With Cards

You and the target place 1 tarot each onto the table, then trade. If you do not have a tarot, $Draw 1 Tarot% and use it.
shortDescription: You and another player privately swap 2 tarots.

title: Winds
fullDescription: $Shuffle% the fate and tarot deck.
shortDescription: Shuffle the fate and tarot deck.

title: Monarchy
fullDescription: The player(s) with the most fates in hand $Draw 2 Tarot%, even exceeding $Max Hand%.
shortDescription: The player(s) with most fates draw 2 tarots, even past max hand.

title: Poverty
fullDescription: The player(s) with the least tarots must $Discard% 1 card.
shortDescription: The player(s) with the least tarots discard a card.

title: Abundance
fullDescription: All players $In Order% $Draw 1 Tarot%.
shortDescription: All players draw a card.

title: Journey
fullDescription: $Shuffle% all fates in hands together, then players draw them $In Order%, even exceeding $Max Hand%.
shortDescription: Redistribute fates equally.
